patthana21.43:1.1: Narūpiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.43:2.1: Narūpiṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.43:3.1: Naarūpiṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
